name: Itch-Sides (OFFICIAL)
description:
This is the actual Itch-sides mod! It is a WIP, Credits go to D-Side mod creators, I've recolored BF, S&P and A bit of monster, Please take note that the D-Side mod is not mine!

BF: My OC

Dad: Pog Burgers (Not done)

S&P: Dom and Parribop

GF: Demitrice (Not Done)

Monster: Void (Started)
